description: In a letter, the traveller asks to be forgiven for taking a marble fragment from Rome in 2017.
title: 'Please forgive me!': US tourist returns block of stolen Roman marble
title_page: 'Please forgive me!': US tourist returns block of stolen Roman marble - BBC News
maintext: He suggested the guilt-ridden globetrotter was a young woman who travelled to Rome in 2017 and took the marble stone home as a gift for her boyfriend. But Mr Verger said he was moved by the letter, which was sent from the US city of Atlanta.
